member.name: T:WebMatrix.Data.ConnectionEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the event of the class.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.ConnectionEventArgs.#ctor(System.Data.Common.DbConnection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The connection that is associated with the event.

member.name: P:WebMatrix.Data.ConnectionEventArgs.Connection
member.summary: Gets the connection that is associated with the event.

member.name: T:WebMatrix.Data.Database
member.summary: Provides methods and properties that are used to access and manage data that is stored in a database.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Close
member.summary: Closes an open database.

member.name: P:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Connection
member.summary: Gets the current connection to a database.

member.name: E:WebMatrix.Data.Database.ConnectionOpened
member.summary: Occurs when a new database connection is opened by a instance.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by a instance.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by a instance and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Execute(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a non-query SQL statement.
member.returns: The count of records affected by the SQL statement.
member.param: The SQL statement to execute.
(Optional) Parameters to pass to the SQL statement.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.GetLastInsertId
member.summary: Returns the identity column of the most recently inserted row.
member.returns: The ID of the most recently inserted row.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Open(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a connection to a database using the specified file name or using the named connection string.
member.param: The name associated with the database to open. can specify an .sdf or .mdf database file that is in the App_Data folder. (Do not include the file-name extension.) Alternatively, can specify the name of a connection string in the Web.config file.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.OpenConnectionString(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a connection to a database using the specified connection string.
member.param: The connection string that contains information that is used to connect to a database.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.OpenConnectionString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens a connection to a database using a connection string and the specified provider.
member.param: The connection string that contains information that is used to connect to a database.
(Optional) The name of the .NET Framework data provider to use to connect to the data source.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.Query(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a SQL query that returns a list of rows as the result.
member.returns: The rows returned by the SQL query.
member.param: The SQL query to execute.
(Optional) Parameters to pass to the SQL query.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.QuerySingle(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a SQL query that returns a single row as the result.
member.returns: The single row returned by the SQL query.
member.param: The SQL query to execute.
(Optional) Parameters to pass to the SQL query.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.Database.QueryValue(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes a SQL query that returns a single scalar value as the result.
member.returns: The scalar value returned by the SQL query.
member.param: The SQL query to execute.
(Optional) Parameters to pass to the SQL query.

member.name: T:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord
member.summary: Represents a data record by using a custom type descriptor and the capabilities of the Dynamic Language Runtime (DLR).

member.name: P:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.Columns
member.summary: Returns a list that contains the name of each column in the instance.
member.returns: A list that contains the name of each column.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.GetDynamicMemberNames
member.summary: Returns a list that contains the name of all dynamic members of the instance.
member.returns: A list that contains the name of every dynamic member.

member.name: P:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the value of a column in the instance using the specified index.
member.returns: The value of the specified column.
member.param: The zero-based index of the column that contains the value to return.

member.name: P:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of a column in the instance using the specified name.
member.returns: The value of the specified column.
member.param: The name of the column that contains the value to return. Name matching is case-insensitive.
member.exception: The instance does not contain a column whose name is a case-insensitive match with the specified name.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetAttributes
member.summary: Returns a list of custom attributes for this instance of a component.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetClassName
member.summary: Returns the class name for this instance of a component.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetComponentName
member.summary: Returns the name for this instance of a component.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetConverter
member.summary: Returns the type converter for this instance of a component.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetDefaultEvent
member.summary: Returns the default event for this instance of a component.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetDefaultProperty
member.summary: Returns the default property for this instance of a component.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetEditor(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns an editor of the specified type for this instance of a component.
member.param: The editor for this object. The value of this parameter is ignored by this implementation and does not affect the outcome of this method.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetEvents
member.summary: Returns the events for this instance of a component.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetEvents(System.Attribute[])
member.summary: Returns the events for this instance of a component by using the specified filter.
member.param: An array that is used as a filter. The value of this parameter is ignored by this implementation and does not affect the outcome of this method.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetProperties
member.summary: Returns the properties for this instance of a component.
member.returns: A collection that represents the properties for this component instance.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetProperties(System.Attribute[])
member.summary: Returns the properties for this instance of a component by using the specified filter.
member.returns: A collection that represents the properties for this component instance.
member.param: An array that is used as a filter. The value of this parameter is ignored by this implementation and does not affect the outcome of this method.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.System#ComponentModel#ICustomTypeDescriptor#GetPropertyOwner(System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor)
member.summary: Returns the object that contains the specified property.
member.param: The property to get the owner of.

member.name: M:WebMatrix.Data.DynamicRecord.TryGetMember(System.Dynamic.GetMemberBinder,System.Object@)
member.summary: Gets the value of a member using the specified name.
member.param: Provides information about the get operation.
When this method returns, contains the value of the member, which can be null. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.exception: The instance does not contain a member whose name is a case-insensitive match with the name that is specified by the parameter.
